channel.title: Help about clients
channel.description:
ok, everytime i run a client it comes up
[code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: EGUI Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: EGUI at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClassInternal(Unknown Source) Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
can anyone help me what do i need to , i have latest JDK so please help

item.title: Help about clients
item.dc:creator: @clest clest
item.description:
@clest wrote:

ive tryed that and yeh compiler works. can you send me a random client that works for you and see what happens when i try to run it please?? much appreciated

Read full topic

item.title: Help about clients
item.dc:creator: @o0_v_1_n_o0 o0 v 1 n o0
item.description:
@o0_v_1_n_o0 wrote:

Does your compiler work? If so

[quote=“xx qwertyuiop xx, post:5, topic:186142”]Oh, EGUI is what the retards use to run their client.
Just run client directly, with any necessary arguments which can be found by decompiling EGUI.[/quote]

Read full topic

@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

Oh, EGUI is what the retards use to run their client.
Just run client directly, with any necessary arguments which can be found by decompiling EGUI.
